website_summaries.verdict: A down-to-earth cookbook that makes the keto lifestyle not feel like a diet.
pros: Focused on taste first and diet second, and delivers the benefits of both
Recipes involve ingredients that are familiar yet produce results desired from principles of the keto diet
Book is enhanced with images that make the recipes only look that much better
We also love the built-in keto scale
cons: Recipes take time and are not 100% keto-friendly

customer_reviews.title: Maria Emmerich is a great cookbook writer
customer_reviews.text: Maria Emmerich is a great cookbook writer. Her instructions are spot on. My only complaint is just that these recipes require so many ingredients. A little to involved. Great for when you have extra time and a well stocked pantry though.
customer_reviews.author: CurlySueBee

customer_reviews.title: Every recipe becomes a favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of Maria's cookbooks for myself and as Christmas presents. These recipes have deep flavor profiles that make them tasty and memorable. Every recipe that we try quickly becomes a favorite. Many of my friends are now interested in Keto because they've seen the delicious things that I eat thanks to Maria. You must try the Goat Cheese Salad, Bananas Foster Fudge, penuche! I can't wait to try every recipe in this book. (Pictured: the Keto Debbies recipe that we made tonight)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Not so user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I returned this cookbook. I am an accomplished cook and found these recipes unwieldy. Too many not so readily available ingredients in most of the recipes.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: These recipes look fantastic but I'm a good cook and theres nothing simple ...
customer_reviews.text: These recipes look fantastic but I'm a good cook and theres nothing simple in here. If you want to spend hours on end in the kitchen you might like this but if you are looking for more realistic recipes that can be cooked in a reasonable time frame this is probably not the cook book for you. Pretty disappointed theres nothing in here that you can make in under an hour. Waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: C. Winters

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cookbooks!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second cookbook I have purchased of Maria's. The recipes are easy to follow and they include beautiful photos. And the food is delicious and has helped me decrease my migraines, lower my A1C and lose 40 pounds. So far, I've only made the Loaded Fries With Ranch, but I'll be making many more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cookbook EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Keto Comfort Foods saved my sanity!!! With a 3 year old with T1 diabetes I was struggling to find low carb meals but this cookbook does not disappoint. Try the pizza pockets, they are to die for plus the little Debbie's ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️. I love this cookbook so much I bought Maria Emmerich's Quuck and Easy Ketogenic Cooking. This book is also a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Nichola Renfrew

customer_reviews.title: No luck with the bake goods
customer_reviews.text: I can follow a recipe and get good results but with this cookbook I have had just failures. I got this book for all the great baked deserts recipes, it and it has been a big let down as they keep failing so as of today the third failure. I will only use the meal recipes some of them are good.
customer_reviews.author: bamboo brewer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: This book is everything!!! The recipes are incredibly delicious and super easy to prepare. I am not a cook folks, before I started Keto, my meals consisted of takeout or frozen dinners. I was afraid of cookbooks, because well..cooking is hard, it takes time, and I hate doing dishes! But the recipes in this book are worth every minute spent in the kitchen, and wrinkled fingers (I should get gloves). My husband has a hard time believing the recipes are sugar free... and the savory stuff!!! I get so many compliments from non-keto people on how delicious they are. I also love how there is a picture with EVERY recipe... I can't tell you how much I appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: M.Castle

customer_reviews.title: Substitutions Galore
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I guess I thought the Ketogenic diet was meant to be based on whole foods and nutrient density. This cookbook was like a throwback to my vegan days, but instead of subbing for animal ingredients, the recipes substitute "Keto" ingredients for carbs. Almond flour, Swerve xylitol sweetener (xylitol is so unhealthy I don't touch the stuff), coconut flour, etc are found in a large portion of these recipes. I don't know what I was expecting, but it wasn't this. If I thought veganism was expensive back in the 90s, I had no idea what Keto ingredients would cost!
customer_reviews.author: Bookenstein

customer_reviews.title: Recipies do not turn out
customer_reviews.text: I have found this authors Keto Cookbook recipes failing to provide the expected results. Over half of the ones I made did not produce the same photographed results.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: I have all of Maria Emmerich's cookbooks but I have to say this may end up being my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I preordered my cookbook and received it yesterday. I made biscuits and gravy (page 42) for dinner last night, it was a hit. I have all of Maria Emmerich's cookbooks but I have to say this may end up being my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Niehenke

customer_reviews.title: Not Bulletproof
customer_reviews.text: The meal recipes are generally awesome throughout this book. Great entrees, side vegetable dishes, and sauces using mostly whole foods and fairly easy to make. Delicious meals. My one, major complaint is the dessert section. Almost every dessert calls for cream cheese and often a ton of it. Anytime I want to make a dessert from this book, I have to buy AT LEAST one brick of cream cheese or the cream cheese alternative she calls for. I just don't always want cream cheese in my desserts. It's strange because all the other recipes in the book don't rely on any one ingredient the way her desserts consistently rely on cream cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Will Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes just difficult to figure out nutritional info
customer_reviews.text: So far everything I’ve tried has been great. However A LOT of the recipes do not tell you how much a serving size is. There’s nutritional info for every recipe per serving.... kinda difficult to figure out what the actual nutrients info is if there’s no actual serving size listed. Carbs are a big deal on this diet so I’d like to know what I’m consuming! Other than that this is great for when you miss non keto food. The sour cream coffee cake and cinnamon roll bread are my favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen E.

customer_reviews.title: Purely Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love everything I've come in contact with from Maria. I love that this isn't merely a cookbook, but a wealth of knowledge from someone truly dedicated to opening people's minds to the untruths spoken about what a healthy diet looks like. The recipes in this book are AMAZING and super tasty!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Had more meat recipes. Didn't have good keto recipes I could use. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Better choices
customer_reviews.text: Been doing keto for almost a year. Have stayed basic but I got this and Craveable Keto for Christmas. This one is good but the recipes seem more involved and require ingredients that I wouldn’t have on hand. If I had to choose I would chose the other. Not to say this one isn’t good but I prefer the other, seems more comprehensive on the whole keto topic. The pics are really nice. There is a strong breakfast section which other books are short on. I haven’t tried any from this book but will be shortly.
customer_reviews.author: K Stan

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Too many weird recipes. It would be good for someone who likes to experiment in the kitchen. I cook for 5, so it wasn’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: V Meserve

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this book and Maria's cookbooks/advice in general
customer_reviews.text: Maria has done it again! I fell off the keto wagon a few months ago due to an unforeseen life event and these recipes are helping me to get back on. I lost 10 pounds in 7 days so far and have 10 to go! My teenager loves preparing and eating these delicious and satisfying meals as well so it's a double win! If you are new to keto, I highly recommend this book and Maria's cookbooks/advice in general. Keto gives abundant energy and a clear mind as well. I'm 50 and I have to say this is the healthiest I have been. I also recommend using Bragg's Apple Cider Vinegar to speed up the keto process. It's a must.
customer_reviews.author: ams

customer_reviews.title: Update.  Uses too many products that are expensive and must be ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best keto recipes you can find. You don’t have to miss out on anything Maria sows you haw to make all your favorite things keto!!! I love this bok. ***** up date. Uses too many height cost products most of us cant afford*******
customer_reviews.author: Christy Salter

customer_reviews.title: Comfort keto... a dream come true!
customer_reviews.text: Her best yet! I have all of Maria's cookbooks and find this one tops them all. I am all about comfort food. This book offers healthy versions of American favorites plus new comforts I would not have thought of. I found myself carrying this book with me to read it like a "page-turner" mystery, just to see what happens next! Get it! You will be happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing keto for a few years now, but never really was able to stick with it. Maria's books have changed all of that. I no longer think about wanting certain foods from restaurants, comfort foods or "junk" that isn't on my plan because I have the tools to make all of this food at home with her books. I thought I was decent at making up keto recipes, but Maria takes creating to an entirely new level. She does things I would have NEVER thought to do, but they turn out amazing! Thank you, Maria for helping me with my goals and these life-changing cookbooks. I'm happier and healthier than I have been in quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: ExTex

customer_reviews.title: By far my favorite cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Maria Emmerich is a brilliant recipe writer. She has taken some of my favorite foods and developed ketogenic versions. I find myself using this cookbook at least once per week. I love all of her cookbooks, but I LOVE this one. Beyond the great, delicious recipes, the book is beautiful. Maria shares a part of herself and her family in everything she puts out. It sits prominently on my kitchen counter along with a few of her other cookbooks. A must have cookbook for the keto way of eating.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Misner

customer_reviews.title: Low carb, high fat made normal!
customer_reviews.text: I love the recipes! Relatively normal ingredients (for a ketogenic lifestyle, anyways.) This book contains lots of family favorites converted to a low carb, high fat version. I like that she includes a photo index at the end, and that she rates each recipe as to low, medium or high on the ketogenic use. So that, for instance, a low keto food has more carbs, but they are still the carbs I use in keto, but I would probably only eat one serving a day, while high keto recipes can make up the bulk of my menu. Great Job, Maria Emmerich!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Topper

customer_reviews.title: Look no further...this IS THE cookbook you NEED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite Keto Cookbook. I have several but just received this one on Mother’s Day!! Amazing recipes, that are easy to follow. They do not call for crazy ingredients that you can’t find at the store. Just great Keto home cooked meals. The entire family loves!!! If your not sure what cookbooks to get when starting Keto, look no further and get this one, you won’t regret it. Maria has a lot of other great/amazing cookbooks....just do a search for her name; so many great books! Thank you Maria for your hard work on all these recipes, you’re truly talented in what you do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Her best yet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Her best yet! Anyone who has taken up the Ketogenic Lifestyle must have this book. All of these recipes are what we Ketoers have been waiting for. There is no way anyone could fall off track or get bored with these recipes. Simple, wholesome food. All of the meals we've been missing are right here! From sweet and savory to downhome goodness, it's all right here. My mouth is watering just looking at the pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I did Maria's 30 day keto cleanse and I've recommended it to others as it was recommended to me. I was so happy to see another recipe book my Maria. I think her taste runs to the very spicy and I have to tone down all her spicy recipes but this was more than I could resist! Love it! Again, some of the recipes are too spicy for us but so far they've all been winners! If you're looking to transition to keto or are already there, this is a great addition to your recipe collection!
customer_reviews.author: Mamo

customer_reviews.title: This Cookbook Makes Me Happier With Keto Lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: I started keto a few months ago. In the beginning, I was motivated by basic recipes. A few months in, sometimes it feels like a lot of compromises, and trying to construct a balanced and interesting meal is something a challenge. I really like this cookbook because it has a lot of indulgent recipes to try to create foods I rather miss. The pictures are beautiful, the directions are clear, and there are a lot of substitutes I hadn’t been aware of before reading through this cookbook. It made me reassess my pantry and buy a few more staples so I can enjoy my meals more, and feel less like I’m missing out.
customer_reviews.author: Both Professional and Fun

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto cookbook I own!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Keto book - best I’ve found! Delicious. Fantastic pictures, easy to follow. For me this is my weekend cooking cookbook though some recipes are quick and easy. Being diagnosed with a rare sucrose intolerance was strange and like learning how to eat a whole new way. I’m an experienced cook but not with many of these ingredients so I was pleased that it wasn’t very difficult once I made some items my new staples.
customer_reviews.author: ScrappyMags

customer_reviews.title: Great for a chef
customer_reviews.text: A number of recipes that were way to complicated for me. Great for a chef.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant! A must have Keto cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of Maria's cookbooks & I can't stop buying them. I actually have 5 (but lost one that a I am still looking for). The recipes are delicious & I like knowing that the macros will be spot on. You don't have to be Keto to love these recipes. You can make them for the whole family & picky eaters. I recommend 100% This book is pure gold. The ketogenic diet is the only "way of eating" that has been sustainable, easy & enjoyable for me. The recipes are great! I also love that every single recipe has a beautiful photograph. I just pre-ordered her Keto Instapot cookbook also that comes out in Dec 2018.
customer_reviews.author: R. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Number Servings Off
customer_reviews.text: I have several Keto cookbooks and this one is not a favorite of mine. My biggest complaint is that the number of servings per recipe are way off. For example the Keto bun recipe states servings is 6 but I easily got 10 buns. This has happened with each recipe I've tried. Which isn't helpful when trying to meal plan etc. Extra servings just means I spent money on ingredients I didn't need and I've wasted money. The chocolate glaze for the donuts was runny and the pulled pork was very bland. I've yet to have success with a recipe from this book. Prepare to make adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf3Shopping

customer_reviews.title: not much help
customer_reviews.text: Not much flavor and nothing I tried turned out. Was not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gratefully

customer_reviews.title: Missing your favorite foods?
customer_reviews.text: Maria Emmerich's Keto Comfort Foods provides macro-friendly recipes for those of us who manage our health by eating low carb/high fat. I made the clam chowder in this book for my mom, who is not eating keto, and we both loved it. The garlicky cheese biscuits are light and fluffy; I wake up sometimes thinking about them. (Then I whip up a batch!) There is a gravy recipe with that one that I've never gotten to because the biscuits are so wonderful on their own! Other delicious recipes include chicken divan, easy Greek fish and fried hush puppies. This cookbook will help you enjoy some favorite foods (including desserts) without any guilt whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Keto Comfort is the perfect name for this cookbook.
customer_reviews.text: Another successful cookbook by Maria Emmerich. I love living a ketogenic way of eating and adding new recipes to my daily life is always exciting. Comfort foods is such a fun cookbook. So many people seem to think you miss out on certain foods or meals while being ketogenic. This book proves them wrong. I have prepared many meals from this book for friends and family and all rave over the flavors. Thank you Maria for another cookbook in m ketogenic library.
customer_reviews.author: Michele S. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: More like a Special Occasions Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: The cookbook is for a more advance cook rather than an average Keto at home cook. The recipes can be time consuming and ingredients complex. As a single-working mom, these are not daily meals for us, but rather special occasion meals. The title could have been "Special occasion Keto". With that said, the recipes are well thought out and the ones I've tried and spot on. It's a nice addition to my Keto library, but with the used a bit more sparingly than I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Bugg

customer_reviews.title: Probably my favorite Maria cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I have several of Maria's cookbooks and really enjoy her recipes. Her indexes are set up differently than most (include pictures and aren't broken down alphabetically), but that's actually really nice if you want to just glance through when planning what you want to make. I personally don't like the intros that tell you about pantry staples (ingredients and tools), but it's something everyone does now. I especially like this book because it has so many options for comfort food on the Keto diet, which isn't something you get often. And there are TONS of desserts (the ultimate comfort food)!
customer_reviews.author: P J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent book and a must have for the keto kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Excellent book and a must have for the keto kitchen. I like the fact that most items required for the recipes are items you normally would have in a keto kitchen. If you don't have the item, Maria tells you where to purchase the item. I love the recipes that I have already made, three of them are our new favorites and my husband and I could eat them every night, they are that good. I do look forward to making many more recipes in the book and have bookmarked the ones I want to try.
customer_reviews.author: Jovai

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful photos, true comfort foods that are doable.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookbook - you’ll find truly comfort foods made better. Feeling your European Roots? Make the Saucy Stuffed Cabbage Rolls. Vegetarian? Try the Roasted Asparagus w Eggs/Hollandaise. Dessert? French Silk ice cream for sure! There is no end to the choices in this cookbook. I really enjoy the great photos and clear recipes, c/w options and alternates. The book starts with great info for the beginner on tools, ingredients and tips, which I very much appreciated. Take time to laze your way through it all and you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Pcllarsen

customer_reviews.title: Your favorite comfort foods made keto!
customer_reviews.text: I love Maria Emmerich's keto cookbooks! I checked this out from my library and just had to have my own copy! The recipes are so great, easy to follow, with great photos and all the macros. If you have a favorite comfort food you're missing on keto, it's probably in this cookbook! There's not a single recipe that I've made that we didn't love! I want ALL her cookbooks! This is the second physical book of hers I have. I also have two of her cookbooks in Kindle format. If you're keto, you can't go wrong with any of Maria's cookbooks.
customer_reviews.author: Gina A. Emory

customer_reviews.title: Special occasion, not comfort foods.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cookbook but not my idea of comfort foods! I cook a lot. This book is more high end, special occasion meals instead of comfort foods. I hate that I spent the money on this book. I might use 5 recipes out of the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Just love Maria's recipes
customer_reviews.text: Just love Maria's recipes. Always find something to make for my LCHF lifestyle. Lost 66 pounds eating this way. Keep your carbs under 20 grams per day, eat healthy fats, eat protein with fat attached. Stay away from Omega 6's as they are inflammatory, and stop the Fructose and all the Soda's. Took one year but its worth it. Never going back to the SAD diet and Maria helps me love my WOE even more.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few of Maria’s books and loved them. I saw this one was recommended on a Keto group I am in and ordered it. Boy, am I ever glad I did. The recipes are tasty, easy to prepare and also kid friendly. My daughter is a super picky eater but has gobbled up the recipes I’ve cooked from this book. My son has adhd and since switching him to a Keto diet, we’ve seen better focus, better mental attitude and he’s off his medications. I have since purchased every book from Maria and Craig! I joined her Facebook group and also follow her website. You won’t be disappointed in the recipes in this book!
customer_reviews.author: H. McLinden

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!! Absolutely love Maria Emmerich's cookbooks. Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Maria Emmerich has the best cookbooks for Keto. We have loved every recipe. I have already preordered her next cookbook. This one is so good and with so many recipes to try. Just trying to decide which recipe is the hardest part. They are all delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of Maria’s Cookbooks and have ordered more. I can’t get enough! I am in the medical field and enjoy reading the biological explanations of the nutrition behind it all. Currently reading “Keto” and its a LOT of condensed information and explained in a way that most anyone can understand. I love the fact that she has “kid approved” recipes. My daughter has hypoglycemia and she does great with more protein and fat. She has liked just about everything I’ve tried, so far!! I also appreciate the extra mile she and her husband go with videos and free online recipes💖 Thank you for all you do!!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Ray Belville Jr.

customer_reviews.title: These recipes are easy to follow and taste better than many traditional meals ...
customer_reviews.text: Execellent book with superb low carb, low sugar recipes not just for Keto followers but anyone wishing to cut carbs and sugars from their diets as a way of life to lower cholesterol and the chance for diabetes! These recipes are easy to follow and taste better than many traditional meals made with white flours and granulated sugars. We use the book every week and find new recipes for dinner, desserts and even hot dog buns were so good! Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Lili0127

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto cookbook we’ve found!
customer_reviews.text: This book has been very informative for my family beginning this way of eating. We have tried 4 recipes so far and each one has left us feeling full and with energy. The recipes are easy to follow and any substitutions and helpful hints are with the recipe. We will be ordering more cookbooks from this author!
customer_reviews.author: Lee D.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying Keto comfort foods!
customer_reviews.text: Living a Keto lifestyle doesn’t need to be boring! This book is full of incredibly hearty comfort foods. I’d never made a cheesecake before nor ever had a Keto one. This one was to die for. I really like how the Author (Maria Emmerich) has listed the macros per serving for the recipe, this really helps to follow macros in an app and not have to add them up myself, especially following her recipes to a T with no alterations. Anyway, buy the book enjoy some Keto comfort food.
customer_reviews.author: MrsHague

customer_reviews.title: Another winner!
customer_reviews.text: I sat down to start reading this cookbook and didn't stop until I had read through every recipe. The recipes are made with easily found ingredients - real food!! The pictures are gorgeous. There are so many things I've marked to make that I will have a hard time choosing what to make first. I've purchased all of Maria's cookbooks and this one does not disappoint. You will love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mactrick12

customer_reviews.title: Culinary keto?
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this book. It was to advanced for my liking. It's like culinary keto book. I didn't do one recipe and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Blake H.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Keto Receipes
customer_reviews.text: Several members of the Keto community that I follow on Instagram are always making recipes from Maria's books. I'm usually not one to use a cookbook per say, but after seeing some of the dishes prepared and not being able to find the recipes otherwise, I decided to go ahead and order. I have not been disappointed yet and have made several of the dishes. Each recipe comes with specific instructions, and a great photo of the meal. There are conversion charts in the book as well. I'm really glad I purchased and hope to pick up a few more of her books.
customer_reviews.author: ACNEL

customer_reviews.title: Packed with healthified comfort food recipes!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful cookbook. All of our favorites, successfully adapted for keto (low carb, moderate protein, high fat) that keeps eating this way easy to do. They are tried and true recipes that come out fantastic. My kids enjoy picking out their favorites and happily eat dinners that are low carb and healthy. The front of the book has information on stocking a ketogenic kitchen and the cookbook is packed with condiments, breakfasts, meals and treats. I just made the chocolate donuts tonight... fast, easy, and yummy! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: This book should be in every keto kitchen across the world - it is THAT good. Every page will leave you drooling
customer_reviews.text: I have been keto for a while but THIS! This book is the holy grail for those days you just need a little something more. This book should be in every keto kitchen across the world - it is THAT good. Every page will leave you drooling. I really just want to cook my way through the entire cookbook! If you are trying to lose weight being keto this may not be the book for you - go for the Cleanse but if you are maintaining then keto on with this one for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: K in Ga

customer_reviews.title: Lots of dairy
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying to limit dairy, this may not be the book for you. Some of the recipes can be adapted to be dairy free.
customer_reviews.author: LBfive

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Food that's healthy
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes on KETO you start to really miss some of the foods you grew up with. Maria is here to save the day with this cookbook. When I needed Mexican food, I made the Skillet Enchilada Casserole. Sometimes it's the seafood I'm craving - Crawfish Etouffee to the rescue. And Texan girls like me have to have their BBQ. Maria's BBQ Pulled Pork sandwiches do not disappoint. There's something for everybody in this cookbook. And even my family members who aren't doing KETO enjoy the meals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keto meals at their finest!
customer_reviews.text: I love all of Maria's cookbooks but this one is a must for a Southern gal. Beautiful pictures, easy recipes, and the best food ever. Maria never steers you wrong with her keto recipes. I'm always amazed at how great it all tastes. My husband has even started this keto journey with me (after realizing it's my new way of life)! I've been doing keto since January 2018; lost 40 pounds; off my blood pressure meds and antidepressants. My doctor is supportive of this way of eating and encouraging me on to lose my last 7 pounds! Buy this! No regrets will be had!
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: No longer a carb junkie!
customer_reviews.text: I was such a carb junkie until I was introduced to Marie Emmerich's Keto cookbooks and her Keto way of cooking that no longer makes me feel like I have to go without or else. She has such an AMAZING way of converting high carb recipes into very tasty low carb tasty recipes! Thanks to her, I no longer feel like I have to go without satisfying my sweet tooth and boy do I feel a lot lighter and more healthier. I have all her cookbooks and couldn't wait to get this one! Thanks so much Marie for changing my way of eating and giving me back my life! Keep up the good work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Moore

customer_reviews.title: Almost all recipes are for oven.
customer_reviews.text: Well if your like me that currently has no stove this book might be a pass for a bit. All the recipes look amazing and every recipe has a picture which I love but 90% of the recipes are oven a few slow cooker which I have but these recipes look so good I want to make them just don’t have an oven right now. Great book though.
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my keto cookbooks but these recipes​ haven't turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Paxton

customer_reviews.title: I love how Maria offers more than just recipes in each ...
customer_reviews.text: What a phenomenal book!! I purchased this after completing the first book I purchased by Maria Emmerich (The 30-Day Ketogenic Cleanse) and was blown away at all the delicious recipes and helpful information in this book. I love how Maria offers more than just recipes in each of her books, as I have purchased two more of them since getting this one. All of her books are well-made and consistent and each one offers AT LEAST 150 brand new recipes. I feel like I will never get bored with this way of eating thanks to her creative recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Great delicious easy comfort food on Keto!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're just starting Keto then this is a good book to start. It has a lot of favorites and you won't feel like you're missing out in your "comfort foods." My family's favorites so far are the garlicky biscuits and gravy. (I actually make the biscuits probably once a week), and the chili in the chili dogs. I like that the ingredients are stuff I already have at home. I don't have to spend a fortune on one recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Some of the BEST keto recipes ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this book. Some of the recipes don't really appeal to me, but the ones that I have made are well worth the price of the whole book. The baked goods manage to actually not taste low carb or gluten free or like a ton of eggs. I've eaten low carb for a long time & these are some of the best recipes I've tried yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristalb

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BOOK
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been following a ketogenic lifestyle for almost two years. In that two years I’ve had a baby and lost 144 pounds. Maria’s books are some of THE best resources out there. The food in this book tastes phenomenal and all her books have great information on Keto. She actually had a whole book on Keto as well that was so helpful. My kids also love these recipes. We make her chili dog.chili all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most delicious and easy Keto recipes ever.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough how wonderful this cookbook is. It is so amazing! Recipes are easy to make and delicious, from breakfast, lunch, dinner, through to desserts and snacks. What really surprised me are the wonderful desserts!!! Another plus is, me already on the Keto diet, there was very little I needed to buy. After buying so many cookbooks that are just ok with a few good recipes, to me this one has all best recipes all in one book. A awesome find.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Witte

customer_reviews.title: Most recipes are quick but all are easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Most recipes are quick but all are easy to follow. The beginning of the book talks about replacement ingredients and any sauce or spice blend you may need is included in this book. There is a good section to help with what fats to use and to avoid and WHY. Ever since I got these books (I have followed her on social media and liked what I say, so I got Maria's books) I have been getting back into cooking like I used to before I started this WOE. If you are worried it will not taste like the original thing, you are right, it's better!
customer_reviews.author: Rob in North Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Good cookbook, would like quicker recipes.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cookbook along with two other Keto cookbooks and have used this one the least. The recipes aren't as quick and there's more unusual stuff in here. I am a Maria Emmerich fan, so I will look for a recipe in here occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: CRUN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received Keto Comfort Foods by Maria Emmerich. My 2nd book by Maria! Beautifully written, easy to read and very easy to follow recipes. Cannot wait to begin cooking from this amazing book. Really cannot say enough about it. My 16 year old daughter is already asking for the Loaded Chicken Nachos on page 96!! I can see that this cookbook will be my go to from now on. Let the cooking begin! Thank you Maria, you are a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn324

customer_reviews.title: Maria’s books are the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th cookbook written by Maria that I have purchased. Her recipes are so good and easy too! That’s why I keep coming back for more. If you want to try out keto cooking, I would highly recommend this book. Maria also includes general information on the ketogenic lifestyle which is really helpful...not to mention the stunning photography! well done!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Keto Cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: I have several Keto cookbooks. This is by far the BEST one I have seen! From the moment you open the Amazon box, you want to just curl up in a chair and go through it cover-to-cover! Then...you open the book...each recipe contains a beautiful picture - from Kringle to Loaded Chicken Nachos to Chicken Cordon Bleu to Bacon Cheeseburger Pizza to Death by Chocolate Cheesecake...yes people, this is a Keto cookbook! The best part? The recipes use normal ingredients and the prep time on most of them is 15 minutes or less - exactly what this working mom of two very energetic kids needs! If you’re thinking about buying this book - do it! You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A

customer_reviews.title: Keto Life Changing!
customer_reviews.text: I don't buy cookbooks; I have always been one to get my recipes online and from people on Instagram, but this book is amazing! Maria gives you so much knowledge about keto in the first part of the book and it's extremely helpful! My favorite recipe so far is the Garlicky Cheddar Biscuits! They taste just like Red Lobster Cheddar Bay Biscuits. Amazing! I have so many things I want to make, I am just so excited. My next book to buy will be her Keto Instant Pot cookbook. Thank you Maria for all your knowledge and sharing this with everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, healthy alternatives to unhealthy favorites.
customer_reviews.text: We have been on a journey to a healthier lifestyle the last couple of years. This cookbook provides healthy, delicious alternatives to our old way of eating favorites: fried chicken, meatballs with gravy, pizza, pulled pork BBQ! In addition to so many delicious main dish meals and savory starters, the desserts are phenomenal. I made the Malted Milk Ball Buche de Noel for our Thanksgiving dessert. It was a HUGE hit with everyone who tried it. If you are trying to improve your overall health without feeling like you're giving up everything you like, I encourage you to try the recipes in Keto Comfort Foods.
customer_reviews.author: DMI

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: I own almost ALL of Maria's cookbooks. Why? Because her recipes are amazing. They are delicious, easy to make ( if you are a from scratch cook like I am) Not only are the recipes delicious, the recipes are easy to follow. Often, people who wish to follow a ketogenic lifestyle do not know where to get good recipes, and good information for doing a ketogenic diet as a lifestyle. Maria's books do both. You will NOT be disappointed at all investing in this book... WAIT... in ALL of them, because they are so good!!!
customer_reviews.author: AgateHunter

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, you can't go wrong with one of Maria's books, and this one is no different! First, you have to know that I love cookbooks. All kinds of cookbooks. I love to read them, think about them, own them. But it's not really that often that I cook from them. But, since I started dabbling in the Keto diet a year ago, I've consistently cooked from Comfort Foods. It has normal foods that even your kids will eat :) I love the Joe's Special, the grilled cheese waffles, and the Amish chicken. But, I also love the chicken pot pie, chili dogs and buffalo chicken casserole. After awhile, you won't miss the carbs at all!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I went though the entire book and there is very little I found I was interested in. I had previously purchased a regular Keto cookbook and that had most of the same recipes but without all the fancy hard to find ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: imlilsis

customer_reviews.title: This book has wonderful recipes that are easy to prepare and the whole ...
customer_reviews.text: First let me say I am so impressed by the research and knowledge Maria has. All of her books provide education to help individuals make healthy choices and transform their bodies. This book has wonderful recipes that are easy to prepare and the whole family would certainly enjoy. Coupled with the recipes are some of the most beautiful, mouth watering photos. Can't wait to dive in. Keep up the awesome work Maria. You are fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: My kind of cook book!
customer_reviews.text: I have now made 3 recipes from this cook book and have so many marked to try that my family will be eating something new every week for the rest of the year! I love that there is a recipe and a beautiful matching photo. I love that the ingredients are simple and that recipes are all pretty easy and not complicated. I would definitely definitely recommend this cook book and have on my IG account!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Going Keto
customer_reviews.text: After performing my research, I decided to go Keto or at least a version of it. Can't remember where I saw reviews about this cookbook but after reading the reviews on Amazon, decided to take the plunge. Great cookbook! Loving the recipes and insider information you find there. I feel like Maria is telling my story! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: acreativemind

customer_reviews.title: The BEST birthday present!
customer_reviews.text: I was jumping for joy when I received these 2 books from my parent's and poochie! Not only does Maria have wonderful, heart-warming recipes but she also guides you to the Keto way of eating. I was once so miserable after every meal I ate. My IBS is gone since I changed to this lifestyle. My mom wasn't familiar with Keto but after reading the books she has a better understanding of this lifestyle. I love hearing the stories of Maria & her family too. She truly has changed my way of eating in a positive way! Thanks Maria, Craig, and family!!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky R

customer_reviews.title: Delicous recipes from cover to cover
customer_reviews.text: Every single recipe in this book has been delicious, not a single recipe has been bland or dissapointing. Most of them take quite a bit of time to makenor prep, but worth the time and effort!! I was expecting to only dog ear a couple go to pages but its cover to cover go to meals!! The reviews of this book are what sold me on it. This book lives on my counter!!
customer_reviews.author: Paste Eater

customer_reviews.title: A must own for any foodie
customer_reviews.text: This was the first keto book from Maria Emmerich I bought and I use it several times a week. This is the best cookbook I’ve ever owned, keto or otherwise. It’s my go to for hearty and delicious meals for my whole family. Until we got this book, my chef husband was completely uninterested in cooking anything keto, but he’s excited about cooking the recipes from this book (and now we have three others from Maria he loves too) and they’re easy enough for me to make and I don’t really like cooking, just the eating part.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Online Recipes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cookbook. The ingredients are realistic and minimal. I gave up a while ago trying to hunt for Keto ingredients locally and just order directly from Amazon. The photos in this cookbook are beautifully aesthetic and a pleasure to flip through as well as cook and enjoy! I’m over trying to make online recipes where I have to scroll endlessly through excessive bloggers personal verbiage to get to the recipe. Extremely pleased - easy instructions, great additional Keto instruction and wisdom. Thank you Maria Emmerich and Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.author: D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Food without the Carbs!
customer_reviews.text: If you love watching shows like Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives where you get to see places all over making delicious mouthwatering food but cringe at all the sugar and flour and JUNK they add into it- this cookbook is for you. All the same delicious decadent ideas like Chicken and Waffles or French Silk Ice Cream with non of the nasty carbs! Such a great way to get that comfort food taste without the comfort food hangover! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Bray

customer_reviews.title: I have 4 of Maria's Books
customer_reviews.text: This book is what it says it is. Maria has done a wonderful job of turning what was a comfort food in my pre-keto days into a delicious ket friendly meal! I love this book so much I gave it as a gift. I have 4 of Maria's books. It is hard to pick my fave so far. If you are new to the Keto way of life I recommend her book titled KETO! or Quick and Easy Ketogenic Cooking. Both of those have meal plans. Peace-Clarisa
customer_reviews.author: Luke Loparo

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased with recipe results
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of her recipe books because two free recipes I got of hers were absolutely AMAZING. Her bread and vanilla ice cream. So far these recipes have been -not so good. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Recipes are BOMB!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been Keto for 16 months. I finally decided to buy a Keto recipe book. This being my first because so many other Keto followers suggested it. I kid you not when I say every single recipe has been a success. I cannot wait to own every single recipe book she has released! They’re phenomenal! Plus, when you tag the author in the post she is grateful and you know she cares! So meaningful!
customer_reviews.author: RBTX88

customer_reviews.title: Currently my most treasured cookbook...
customer_reviews.text: I told myself I didn’t need one more cookbook in this house until I discovered Maria Emmerich’s “Keto Comfort Foods.” I enjoy all the beautiful food photography as well as the AMAZING recipes! It’s gorgeous! Your favorite comfort dishes turned keto...further reinforcing my feelings that I’m not missing out on anything living a ketogenic lifestyle. Thank you Maria, can’t wait receive the 30 Day Cleanse Cookbook!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Scarberry

customer_reviews.title: love this cookbook
customer_reviews.text: This book has very easy uncomplicated recipes. You don't have to worry about buying a bunch of ingredients (you have to get a few) very easy. I made the Chicken and biscuits and it was very good. Picking out something for dinner today :)
customer_reviews.author: Dan Merrithew

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cookbooks!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing recipes!! I just sat down at my lake and made up a menu for the week. I have three of her books and will be buying more! Keto has been so easy to do, you stay full in between meals so you are not looking to snack! That’s amazing for me. I also love having desserts some days and these recipes are delicious! Had chocolate ice cream last night! what amazes me is to eat like this and be able to lose weight. Make sure you add several to your collection you won’t be disappointed:)
customer_reviews.author: Jerri OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Recipes too time consuming.
customer_reviews.text: Every recipe I come across that I like has 25 steps to it. I don't understand why this book has so many 5 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: P. Marino

customer_reviews.title: The Most Complete Keto Book out there
customer_reviews.text: This book is really beyond expectations! At first I was a bit overwhelmed with this book - but once I started learning about Maria and her style - things got easier. The recipes are easy to follow and really you have SO MANY options! You can cook pretty much anything with Maria's book and still keep and maintain a Keto lifestyle. If you like to impress your guests and like to cook - this book is for you. There is also recipes for 30mins or less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes My Food Life So Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of my FAVORITE cookbooks! I have had to be grain free since March 2017 when I had my Lyme disease related stroke. It had been a journey for sure to transition to this lifestyle and when fall came I really struggled! I wanted many foods that I could not have any more. This cookbook was a life saver! A few of my favorite recipes from this cookbook are: Red Velvet Pancakes, Monte Cristo Crepes, Loaded Fries with Ranch, Chicken Divan, Amish Chicken and Gravy....so I guess there are too many too list!! Thank you Maria for making my food life SO much easier!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ludt

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to recipe book for keto
customer_reviews.text: Maria makes cooking fun again. After getting fat adapted, and making the same recipes for months, I saw this book and knew I had to have it. Recipe after recipe never disappoints. Maria makes even challenging recipes approachable, and I love every single one. There isn’t a dud in the book. And the pictures are gorgeous! Thanks to Maria, my new way of eating feels like something I can easily do for a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Rush

customer_reviews.title: Staples plus a few
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this book less than 48 hours and have already cooked breakfast , lunch, dinner and desserts from it! I truly love it and everything tastes great! This book does call for some nonstaples like unsalted butter and cherry or Apple extract so order up. But most things can be prepared with the keto staples and are yummmm my ! Flappers, chicken salad, cheddar biscuits
customer_reviews.author: aja b

customer_reviews.title: Love My Comfort Foods
customer_reviews.text: I miss comfort foods the most and love finding ways to make them Keto. This is one of my favorite cookbooks. I bought a few as I got tired of searching the web looking for things to try. I am an old fashion book girl and the writing is big enough for my bad eyes. The pictures are great and instructions easy to follow. Of course some do take some time to prepare, but it is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: This book is labeled keto but if you want to ...
customer_reviews.text: This book is labeled keto but if you want to make delicious recipes using whole foods, this is a must have! Dairy free? Sure. Keto? of course. Gluten free? Goes without saying. Take control of your health and eat fabulous food while you do.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes and absolutely delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought two books keto air fryer and keto comfort. I want to thank Maria for creating recipes that are easy to make and absolutely delicious! I started keto 11 days ago and am already down 8 lbs and have zero cravings for carb laden foods... why? ... because I am equipped with these books that show me how to make delicious substitutes for high carb foods. I am so happy I bought the books and have recommended them to friends! 🙌🏻 I especially appreciate that every recipe has a picture and are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca l morgan

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: I normally look up my keto recipes either on Pinterest or through Instagram although I decided to buy this cookbook for myself. Not the Kindle version ... the actual book. I love it! I'm going through the recipes one by one. So far I've made the stuffing muffins, crispy chicken, and the pot roast. The ingredients are what you should already have on hand. Nothing too out of the ordinary. The skillet crispy chicken is to die for! I've made it the last two weeks. If you're interested in doing Keto and aren't a little overwhelmed I would recommend this cookbook. It's basic and delicious. You will not feel "deprived" from your pasta and breads. I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate - order it NOW!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! If you're keto (or even if you're not!), go and order this book NOW! I started a keto lifestyle a little over a week ago after much research. I was really nervous as to whether or not I could do it and stay with it. I thought I would have to miss my favorite foods and eat all kinds of weird things. Then I found this cookbook. Maria's recipes are amazing! So good and easy to make, too. My family has been loving everything I've made, even my two teen boys. It is SO worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Empfield

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of great recipes in here! Most are very easy to follow to get quality results. Some are a little more complicated but easy to follow if you take your time.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Blodgett

customer_reviews.title: A better way to keto...
customer_reviews.text: I found myself in a keto cooking rut before purchasing this book. It has been fun to make new dishes that are a nice twist on family favorites. Plenty of variety to feed even picky little eaters. These are some of my favorite Friday Night Family dinner recipes where we have something that seems indulgent, and a lot like comfort food, yet is keto. Keeping true to her style, Maria offers tips and tricks, along with macro breakdowns and stunning photography. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: brooke yunk

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate, this is a great keto cookbook/guide!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing keto recipes! I love this cookbook, it’s one of many that I own of Maria’s. It doesn’t matter if you are new to keto or have been doing it for years, this cookbook is a wealth of information and great recipes. I made her sour cream coffee cake, did half the recipe & it made 6 mini Bundts...it was amazing, tasted incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Harrell
